anathema: Abuse someone you have accepted power over, allow a victim to escape due to gloating, snivel before authority, shout
edict: Spread fear in others, hide dangerous secrets, shock the self-righteous, kill the guilty to protect the innocent
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Kalekot (The Winnower)](/Deities.aspx?ID=676)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 17

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Spread fear in others, hide dangerous secrets, shock the self-righteous, kill the guilty to protect the innocent

**Anathema** Abuse someone you have accepted power over, allow a victim to escape due to gloating, snivel before authority, shout

**Area of Concern**
Fear, silence, safekeeping, the reviled

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [jaw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356) or [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=69), [Dragon](/Domains.aspx?ID=106)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Vanishing Tracks](/Spells.aspx?ID=1737)

- **3rd**
[Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=1622)

- **4th**
[Vision of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=1742)

</column>
name: Kalekot (The Winnower)
religious_symbol: Snake piercing its head with a dagger
